name: SENSELESS CITY Homebrew NES Game
description:
This is my second NES homebrew game, SENSELESS CITY.  Like my first game GRAVEYARD DUDE, it was also built using the Retro Puzzle Maker, after which I heavily modified it with new graphics and music:

puzzle.nes.science/home

You can find GRAVEYARD DUDE HERE:

https://destroyed4com4t.itch.io/graveyard-dude-homebrew-nes-game

This game is a more of an experiment, or maybe just an extended flex on the capabilities of the Retro Puzzle Maker tool. At the beginning of the game, you can choose between two characters, which determines the music, graphics and color pallette of the puzzles going forward. So it's almost like two different games!.. just with the same puzzles.

I may come back to this and add more levels, I might expand it to a CNROM to give it a fancy title screen and ending graphics or who knows. I just figure right now it does everything I wanted it to do when I thought of it.
